name: 2020 Simulator
description:
A crazy lab has accidentally opened up a wormhole, and it's causing loads of weird events to take place here on earth!

You are the government of governments, some may call you the secret government, but your job is simple keep the planet alive for as long as possible! The scientist claim they can have the wormhole closed in a year! can you survive?

This game contains exactly 12 minutes of gameplay; A minute a month.
